ItemDesc: A colored draft of Clockie that brings the dream to life with vibrant colors. Used to level up Traces significantly for <color=#f29e38ff>Erudition</color> characters.
ItemBGDesc: Clockie becomes filled with colors, taking on the shape that will become a household name. Clockie's story inspired millions of Dreamchasers, with every one of them able to be inspired by his fantastical adventures.\n\n"My name is Clockie, and I'm a superstar in Dreamville Penacony!"
